Articles.Content: When we went to this new forum, there was a conversation asking about rep and if it would still be there. Well, here we are and we now see it below our names. My question is where do I go / what do I have to do to give others rep now?

18 minutes ago, FiiZzioN said:

When we went to this new forum, there was a conversation asking about rep and if it would still be there. Well, here we are and we now see it below our names. My question is where do I go / what do I have to do to give others rep now?

"Like" their posts. You can "Like" 25 posts a day. Each "Like" gives the person 1 rep.
Moved over to the Kerbal Network, the forum about the forum.

16 minutes ago, Red Iron Crown said:

Moved over to the Kerbal Network, the forum about the forum.

Sorry about that, I normally post in the addon's section. My lack of forum knowledge is showing, lol!

 

Also, thanks horseman!

30 minutes ago, 5thHorseman said:

"Like" their posts. You can "Like" 25 posts a day. Each "Like" gives the person 1 rep.

Which is rather counterintuitive since we have the little green plus next to the rep number. It'd likely make more sense to let "likes" only apply to a given post (like an ad-hoc voting system), and return reputation mechanics to what they were before.
